comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Clemens Ernst Gottlieb von Delbrück (born 19 January 1856, Halle an der Saale, died 17 December 1921, Jena) was a German nationalist politician and later nobleman." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clemens_von_Delbr%C3%BCck

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B-59:  Thanks. We'll include this gentleman's full name next time we update.
